sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ContextActionsAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>A few utility scripts to call from the client context actions</description>
        <name>ContextActionsAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ContextActionsAjax = Class.create();

ContextActionsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

  getLabel : function() {
     var lbl = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
     lbl.addQuery('name', this.getType());
     lbl.addQuery('element', this.getValue());
     lbl.query();
     if (lbl.next())
         return lbl.label;
   
     return '';
  },
	
  setWatchField: function() {
	  gs.getSession().setWatchField(this.getParameter("sysparm_id"));
  },	
	
  clearWatchField: function() {
	  gs.getSession().clearWatchField();
  },

  type: "ContextActionsAjax"
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>cmitchell</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2010-05-13 20:50:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>936ee1210a0a0b8e0045bb197955d507</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ContextActionsAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_936ee1210a0a0b8e0045bb197955d507</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2013-01-19 01:04:28</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>595</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
